content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or experiences. However, sound meditation is often used as a tool for stress and anxiety relief. The sound vibrations can help relax the body and soothe the mind, inducing a deep state of relaxation and reducing the physiological symptoms of stress and anxiety, such as rapid heartbeat, shallow breathing, and muscle tension. Sound meditation has also been shown to increase feelings of calmness and well-being, improve mood, and promote better sleep. However, the effectiveness of sound meditation can vary from person to person, and it may not be a suitable form of therapy for everyone. It is always recommended to consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new form of meditation or relaxation technique.
